summary: HEADLIGHTS FLIP UP AND DOWN AND MAKES GRINDING NOISE WHEN CAR IS TURNED OFF.  SAME OCCURS WHEN FACTORY INSTALLED ALARM IS ACTIVATED.  DEALER REPORTS ACTUATOR BAD.  SAME PROBLEM HAS OCCURRED 4 TIMES SINCE 2000.  ALONG WITH THAT, THE DRIVER SIDE WINDOW MOTOR HAS BURNED OUT TWICE ALONG WITH THE ACTUATOR.  REAR END OF VEHICLE RATTLES NEAR SPEAKERS.  DRIVER SIDE INTERIOR DOOR PANEL LOOSE.   *JB
